# vertexFormat

**Instance Property**

Describes the format of the vertices in the vertex buffer.

## Declaration

```swift
var vertexFormat: MTLAttributeFormat { get set }
```

## Discussion

This property controls the format of the position attribute of the vertices the [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTL4AccelerationStructureTriangleGeometryDescriptor/vertexBuffer] references.

The format defaults to `MTLAttributeFormatFloat3`, corresponding to three packed floating point numbers.
